name: I HATE JAZZ
description:
This game was created for the Krass Game Jam 3
The theme that we were given is "An action game where you punch jazz singers inside a gigantic terrarium"

To play the game:

- Arrow keys move the punk ← ↑ →
- Press A S or D to block the different colour bombs
- Punch the jazz singers (auto) to clear the level

There are a total of 12 levels!

by @Anticdope @KaifuKM and @cheapshot
